scripts.copy-to-libs-messages: syncdir ts-proto-generated/ ../libs/messages/src/ts-proto-generated && sed -i 's/import { Observable } from "rxjs";/import type { Observable } from "rxjs";/g' ../libs/messages/src/ts-proto-generated/messages.ts
scripts.proto-all: yarn run proto && yarn run ts-proto && yarn run copy-to-back && yarn run copy-to-pusher && yarn run copy-to-libs-messages
scripts.proto:watch: yarn run proto-all; run-p proto:watch-need-regenerate proto:watch-files
scripts.proto:watch-need-regenerate: inotifywait -q -m -e create ../back/src/Messages/generate_request/ ../pusher/src/Messages/generate_request/ | while read -r filename event; echo "Inotify got event $event on file $filename"; do yarn run proto-all; done
scripts.proto:watch-files: inotifywait -q -m -e close_write protos/messages.proto | while read -r filename event; echo "Inotify got event $event on file $filename"; do yarn run proto-all; done
